text: The second ‘Coimbatore Artists Meet 2016’ will be organised at Kasthuri Sreenivasan Art Gallery on Avinashi Road from March 23 to 27. Artists R. Varatharajan of Karamadai and A. Jothivel of Mettupalayam will display and offer for sale their works under the title ‘Realections’. The expo will be open from 10 a.m. to 6.30 p.m.
title: Art exhibition
